lead_paragraph: Mr. Sanders gave no indication that he was ready to leave the race just yet, insisting that he would compete in next week’s primary contest in Washington, D.C.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti and Jonathan Martin contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ALAN RAPPEPORT and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Meets President Obama and Pledges to Work to Defeat Donald Trump

snippet: Mr. Sanders gave no indication that he was ready to leave the race just yet, insisting that he would compete in next week’s primary contest in Washington, D.C.
